privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At Coach Online, we take your privacy very seriously. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.infoWeCollectDescription: We collect the information you provide to us directly when you use our services, including:
privacy.nameEmail: Your name, email address, and other contact information.
privacy.usageInfo: Information about your use of our services.
privacy.otherInfo: Any other information you choose to share with us.
privacy.useOfInfoDescription: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.protectInfoDescription: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.changesPolicyDescription: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on our website.
privacy.contactDescription: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at contacto@coachonline.com.
